content: the cottage 18a annaghanoon road waringstown craigavon county armagh just a plain v this simple baby cardigan is knit from the top down and is completely seamless even though you will be using circular needles you will be knitting flat then you pick up stitches along the front edges and neckline and knit this sleeves are knit in the round instructions are based on the magic loop method using long 100cm circular needles but you can use two circular needles or double ended needles sizes newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-18 months finished measurements chest - 38 41 43 46 48 5 cm / 15 16 17 18 19 inches materials dk yarn approx 60g - 200g 3 75mm circular needles 60cm 4 5mm circular needles 60cm & 100cm scrap yarn a yarn needle to weave ends in 4 stitch markers meterage/yardage approximate nb 220/275 0-3mths 280/310 3-6mths 310/340 6-12mths 330/360 12-18mths 385/420 1 gauge/gauge 22st x 28rows = 10 cm 4 inches in stockinette stitch abbreviations used k knit p purl rs - right side ws - wrong side st s - stitch es stst - stockinette stitch yo - yarn over kfab - knit front & back increase 1 st ssk - slip 2sts knitwise transfer the 2sts to the left hand needle & knit thru back loops pm - place marker sm - slip marker k2tog - knit two stitches together decrease 1 stitch repeat - repeat stitches used stockinette st - when knitting back and forth k1 row p1 row when knitting in the round k every round rib pattern - *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row when knitting in the round & in row knit the knits purl the purls instructions with your 4 5mm 60cm circular needle cast on 38 40 42 48 50 sts set up row in this row you will be adding stitch markers to show you where to increase for the sleeves row 1 ws p2 pm p 8 8 8 10 10 pm p 18 20 22 24 26 pm p 8 8 8 10 10 pm p2 you will now start increasing for sleeves and neck essentially you increase into a stitch before and after each stitch marker begin sleeve/yoke increases row 2 rs knit to one st before marker kfab sm kfab x 4 times knit to end of row - 8sts increased 2 row 3 ws and all other ws odd row purl slipping markers as you come to them row 4 rs kfab k to 1 st before marker kfab sm kfab *knit to one st before marker kfab sm kfab * repeat from * to * to last 2sts k1 kfab 10sts increased row 5 ws purl slipping markers as you come to them essentially you will be increasing on every second row on the right side for the sleeves and every 4th row on the right side for the neck front increases repeat row 2 to 5 5
